thread.section_title: Mychoicesoftware Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mychoicesoftware | mychoicesoftware.com
thread.title: Paul Sandin

author: Paul Sandin
title: Paul Sandin
text:
To be frank, I was nervous about downloading and installing software. It never seems to go well for me. I made the purchase and waited for just a few minutes for the email. When it came it started out by saying "we are out of stock". My heart sank, but then the next line said they were sending a free upgrade, so I started the download.
The instructions were clear and easy to follow, and the whole process took about 10 minutes.
Very pleased with the service and will be using it again.
